description:
Waking up in a strange new place with no memory of his past life, Kelvin learns that he’s bartered away those very memories in exchange for powerful new abilities during his recent transmigration. Heading out into a whole new world as a Summoner — with his first Follower being the very goddess who brought him over! — Kelvin begins his new life as an adventurer, and it isn’t long before he discovers his hidden disposition as a battle junkie. From the Black Knight of the Ancient Castle of Evil Spirits to the demon within the Hidden Cave of the Sage, he revels in the fight against one formidable foe after another. Join this OP adventurer in an exhilarating and epic saga as he and his allies carve their way into the annals of history!

(Source: J-Novel Club)
synonyms: นักอัญเชิญทมิฬ

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Creature Taming
tags.description: Features the taming of animals, monsters, or other creatures.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Slavery
tags.description: Prominently features slaves, slavery, or slave trade.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Afterlife
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the afterlife.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Religion
tags.description: Centers on the belief that humanity is related to supernatural, transcendental, and spiritual elements.

name.native: トリスタン・ファーゼ
シュトラ・トライセン

node.description:
Affiliated with Studio Live. Admires [Kazuko Tadano](https://anilist.co/staff/118426/).

Her designs are very shoujo manga like, often featuring glittering eyes.

[Website](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/suzuki-minori.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/minoringo_staff) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7f1T-CF50uNMmGK_I9cILQ) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/3Ath9xfI4WBdrZPFQ4VX9A?si=RqHEeCs9Sci2RtrWnmqvfQ) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/minoringo_official/)

She got picked out of 8000 people for the role of [Freyja Wion](https://anilist.co/character/90101/Freyja-Wion). She had no prior voice acting work.

Minori Suzuki is a member of the real-life idol group, [Walküre](https://anilist.co/staff/226500/Walkre)
